notes: If the mana gain cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that is used before your mana pool.  If this mana is not used before the duration, the extra mana is lost.
desc: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 HP to temporarily gain 150 Mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.
lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those around it.
